value:
I'm glad I thought to bring along my
bow! I gotta admit, though—I didn't
expect it to be this good for fishing!

The Nabata Desert was scorching,
but the heat here is totally different...
There's a breeze, for one thing!

I'd love to have the honor of serving
Prince Alfonse and Princess Sharena
one of the fish I caught...

Don't scary creatures live in the sea?
I'll have to stay alert to ensure Lord
Roy and his friends remain safe!

Since we came all the way to the
coast, I want Lord Roy to be able
to taste all the best saltwater fish!

Phew! Hot one today, isn't it? Oh!
I'm here with a fish delivery from
$Nf. Here ya go!

Just what I wanted...a huge fish!
I hope Lord Roy enjoys it.

Looks like I've hit my stride, but...
I'm still just getting started!

Ugh... Catching fish with a bow and
arrow is a lot more work than you
might think...

Wow! Thank you! I'll make sure to put
this to good use.

I'm Wolt! I serve with the Knights of
Pherae. I'm hoping to help Lord Roy
make some good summer memories.

Phew... This is my first time ever
hunting in the ocean. Who knew you
could fish with a bow and arrow?!$k$pIt seems Lord Roy and Lady Lilina
are enjoying the ocean... I'm sure
they'll both treasure this memory.$k$pIf only we could enjoy the summer
like this forever... But that's not our
purpose. We've got work to do...$k$pThat's why I'm going to do my best
to help end the fighting in this world
as soon as possible!$k$pI'll give everything I've got to create
a world where days like these can be
spent relaxing instead of fighting!
たあっ
それっ！
うわっ…
溺れる…！
You're going down!
Strike while it's hot!
To a watery grave!
Phew! Ready for this?
But the sun's...still up...
Ahaha
This...heat! I've never been anywhere this hot before!
Even during leisure time, I must stay vigilant and keep Lord Roy safe from harm.
I'm actually a real strong swimmer. I'm used to the river currents in Pherae, you know!
*grump* I should have let Sue teach me how to ride a horse when I had the chance...
I heard sunburns can sting for days... I'd better be careful.
Look how many fish I caught with just my bow! Pretty impressive, right?
It's so nice that we get to enjoy summer here, together. Now—let's get swimming!
Wouldn't miss it.
Time to dive in?
Ah! Sun's in my eyes!
